Text: ENJOY The Book of Unwritten tales by Reloaded!
I love these point & klick games, Thank you Hero_No_1 =D
got viruswarning from aVast concerning setup.exe!

It's nearly allways a false positive virus but you don't have to worry, this is a good uploader! Thnx Hero_No_1! But is this in english? The videos on youtube showed only in german, have nothning against that but prefere english :)

@ waldurify
Game is in full English :)

@ Klonjo
Can start ok, but just after frist two intro movies the game starts with some text on screen then it crashes with a blue screen :(. shame realy wants to play this.
Anyone esle having any problems, would be great to work around it and get this working

I too am getting a virus warning on SETUP.EXE. take a look here for the scan result:

http://www.virustotal.com/file-scan/report.html?id=4e6d217b86f15c6ae57e7c2b7ff46b5b36398cb12b4ae3337bc404d4d330299a-1320308068

whilst i can appreciate that a CRACK may give a false positive - a setup.exe file giving these results is very suspicious to me, especially as I have NEVER had this kind of warning with ANY other reloaded or other scene release. Im not knocking the uploader b4 anyone flames!! Just checking first...

Any thoughts anyone?
@ marco699 ...it's a patch on the hompage, maby it will fix the problems: http://bout.kingart-games.com/box_version_patch.html

Here's an analysis of "setup.exe" uploaded from a read-only mounted image:

To people who are getting virus positives on "setup.exe" - I got bad news for you: YOUR system is already infected and it has nothing to do with THIS torrent.
Everything worked for me except the crack .exe file.  Very sad. If anyone's got any ideas, let me know; I'd love to try this game.
